data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control Announces Vendor for Public Awareness Campaign
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO â€“ The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) today announced that KP Public Affairs of Sacramento was awarded a contract to develop a two-year statewide public awareness and education campaign related to the licensure of commercial cannabis businesses in California. The Bureau initially issued a Request for Proposals in November 2018 and then proceeded to […]
